cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value -1 will cause thread allocation failure and prevent the CU from starting.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_portc to an invalid negative port number -1 will cause socket binding failure and prevent the DU from establishing F1 connection.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_portc 設定為無效的負端口號 -1 會導致套接字綁定失敗，並阻止 DU 建立 F1 連接。
